roleset.name: re-examine
roleset.note: RECHECK-V NOTES: Based on check.01 and data in Clinical Notes corpus. Framed by Anwen Feb 2011. (from recheck.01-v)
RECHECK-N NOTES: Relation to check.01. Added by Jena. (from recheck.01-n)

example.name: Args 0 and 1
example.text: Nurse Jebediah rechecked the patient's stitches.

example.name: All Args
example.text: Dr. Jennifer rechecked the patient's blood for signs of parasites.

example.name: checkup
example.text: He has had no recheck since then in large part because of his fear of having another perforation.
example.arg: in large part because of his fear of having another perforation
